pr_title: [Enhance] Add "statistics" meta table and fix some mysql compatibility problem

timeline.message: 1,Add metadata table ‘statistics’ to store index information;2,Modify the return type of method ‘str_to_date’ to the actual type datetime;3,In the header information returned by mysql, the data type length is returned according to the actual type.

timeline.bodyText: Remove author name, it is not necessary

timeline.message: 1,Delete the modification of a function;2,Delete modifier name.
